about_the_game:
Join the map creation guild and become a successful business owner.

You start with your first store and can go straight into the first dungeon to explore it.
A dungeon can be successfully mapped once you have run through it from the beginning to the exit.
Every dungeon you explore until you reach the exit gives you another map to sell.
Own the best map store on the island and put your rival out of business.



The island you are on is divided into 9 areas.
You can only explore the dungeons in the area around the store. If you want access to other dungeons, you need another store in the area. However, only one store is allowed per area and your rival will do the same to grow.
Expand as soon as possible.



Once you have collected enough money, you can spend it on upgrades and more stores.
Everything you do to improve your stores leads to a higher market share and prestige. This attracts more adventurers who want to spend their money with you.
Upgrade your stores and attract more customers.



If you succeed, your market share grows so high that your opponent has no more customers and you become the only map seller on the island. Otherwise, you could lose everything or end up in prison if you can no longer pay your debts.
Keep an eye on your growth and market share and explore as many dungeons as possible.
detailed_description:
Join the map creation guild and become a successful business owner.

You start with your first store and can go straight into the first dungeon to explore it.
A dungeon can be successfully mapped once you have run through it from the beginning to the exit.
Every dungeon you explore until you reach the exit gives you another map to sell.
Own the best map store on the island and put your rival out of business.



The island you are on is divided into 9 areas.
You can only explore the dungeons in the area around the store. If you want access to other dungeons, you need another store in the area. However, only one store is allowed per area and your rival will do the same to grow.

Once you have collected enough money, you can spend it on upgrades and more stores.
Everything you do to improve your stores leads to a higher market share and prestige. This attracts more adventurers who want to spend their money with you.
Upgrade your stores and attract more customers.



If you succeed, your market share grows so high that your opponent has no more customers and you become the only map seller on the island. Otherwise, you could lose everything or end up in prison if you can no longer pay your debts.
Keep an eye on your growth and market share and explore as many dungeons as possible.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (or similar distribution)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: HalfMoon Adventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 580 (8 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: You own a store for weekend adventurers and mainly sell maps of dungeons. You sell maps during the day and crawl through dungeons at night. However - the market for map sellers is in high demand.Try to offer the best maps and push your competitor out of the market!
